thread.section_title: Hotel Original Paris - UPDATED 2017 Reviews & Price Comparison (France) - TripAdvisor
thread.title: Loved the quirky decor
thread.title_full: Loved the quirky decor - Review of Hotel Original Paris, Paris, France - TripAdvisor

author: Maureen S
title: Loved the quirky decor
text: We had a really enjoyable stay in this friendly hotel. Our room was comfortable and we loved the twinkly lights and quirky touches. Breakfast was delicious fresh croissants! The hotel could not have been more convenient for the metro and as well as cafes and restaurants in easy walking distance there is a fabulous salon de th√® a few doors down.
